name: Starswift: Classic Space Shooter
description:
Classic Shoot'em up!

Face endless waves of enemy invaders!

Retro space shooter look!

Pixel art and white noise effects!

Challenging enemies!

Destroy all of your enemy aliens and bosses!

Free ships!

Select one of the five fast ships with its own weapons!

Compete!

Score high and get to the top of the leaderboard!
